channel.title: Dragon Claws! (URGENT! READ THIS AND HELP PLEASE!)
channel.description: so i have a server with dragon claws rite,but the specials are so like weak. i would hit like 0,0,0,20 for example. the last hit or the first hit is the only non-zero hit. can anyone help me?! oh and if anyone needs the way to make d claws hit 4 times look it up in search. it should be in your top results. but if anyone knows how to help me, please tell me. if i am offline here you can add my msn. :)

so i have a server with dragon claws rite,but the specials are so like weak. i would hit like 0,0,0,20 for example. the last hit or the first hit is the only non-zero hit. can anyone help me?! oh and if anyone needs the way to make d claws hit 4 times look it up in search. it should be in your top results. but if anyone knows how to help me, please tell me. if i am offline here you can add my msn.
